abstract.para: &ollama; is a tool for running and managing language models locally on your computer. It offers a simple interface to download, run and interact with models without relying on cloud resources.

tip.para: When installing &suseai;, &ollama; is installed by the &owui; installation by default. If you decide to install &ollama; separately, disable its installation during the installation of &owui;.

topic.para: The following procedure describes how to install &ollama; as a separate application.

step.para: Run the indicated helm pull command.

tip.para: To override the default installation values, create a custom values.yaml file and specify it during the following helm install command with the -f values.yaml option. For a list of all installation options with examples, refer to .

step.para: Install the &ollama; chart. Assume that the release name is ollama, for example.
